Refugees and Education: Confronting the Crisis

Harvard University


Sat April 9 2016

About the conference

First of its kind

The first of its kind at Harvard University, the Refugees and Education Conference will delve into one of the most pertinent issues of our time.

One day, three panels

Refugees and Education: Confronting the Crisis, is a one-day event that strives to engage researchers, practitioners and policymakers from Europe, the Middle East and the US.

Attend and be inspired

We strive not only to offer a space for rich discussion but also to serve as a call to action and a springboard for possible solutions.

Learn more
